description: Shashin, Japanese Canadian Photography to 1942, 2005 [Based on the Japanese Canadian National Museum’s touring exhibition. The exhibition was curated by Grace Eiko Thomson, who also coordinated this catalogue publication that includes essays by Jan Gates, Imogene Lim, Patricia Roy, Phyllis Senese, Grace Eiko Thomson and Jim Wolf. Paperback, 92 black and white images throughout the book. 96 pages] (), p. 299
title: Shashin, Japanese Canadian Photography to 1942
